materials.raw_text: B: 32.5 g, Mn: 13 g, Nb: 14 g, Ru: 65 g, Tm: 13 g

sourcing.instructions: B: Chemical supply stores (or online), Mn: Metal suppliers, Nb: Specialty alloy suppliers, Ru: Precious metal dealers, Tm: Rare earth material suppliers
steps: B: Chemical supply stores (or online), Mn: Metal suppliers, Nb: Specialty alloy suppliers, Ru: Precious metal dealers, Tm: Rare earth material suppliers
1. Weigh each ingredient precisely using a digital scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh each ingredient precisely using a digital scale.

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 4-6 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 4-6 hours).

steps: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible and inspect for any surface imperfections.
